mdRecord.dcterms:title: Alderman Library
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R. [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: publicity photographs; from excerpt on photo: Virginia's first book on tobacco is given to the University of Virginia by the Philip Morris Company. University President Colgate W. Darden Jr., President of Philip Morris O. Parker McComas, and Thomas P. Abernathy, professor of history at the University, left to right above, are examining Daniel MacKercher's small volume, printed in Williamsburg in 1737, of which only one other copy is known to exist. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
